analysis_age: Stating "be a part of a young, friendly team" introduces implicit bias against older workers.
text: :  . ,  . If you wanna gain practical experience from the 1st day of work,. If you wanna be independent and lead your own projects in 1 year of work,. If it's important for you to be a part of a young, friendly team,. Then come to Us! Bellerage is looking for talented candidates to start a career in Financial Outsourcing & Consulting. Bellerage is one of the leading service providers in the market for outsourcing, consulting and auditing services for international companies in Russia. We offer: Work in the international consulting environment. Resolving real business cases. Constant load with the possibility of visiting the university. Fast career growth. 2 minutes walk from metro Serpukhovskaya / Dobryninskaya. Cookies and sweets ). Our expectations: Excellent communication and strong nalytical skills. Performance, multitasking. English from upper-intermediate. Technical or Economical University is an advantage. We are waiting for you! B1    , ,   , 242.

  • If you wanna gain practical experience from the 1st day of work,

    Then come to Us!

    Bellerage is one of the leading service providers in the market for outsourcing, consulting and auditing services for international companies in Russia.

  • We are waiting for you!
